      • getLongestWord

        public static java.lang.String getLongestWord(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> letters,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dictionary)

      • getLetter

        public static char getLetter()
        gets a single random weighted character provided by instructor
        Returns:
        char - the random weighted char
        See Also:
        Scrabble letter distribution

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        the main method calls the helper method, reads the dictionary from a file into an arrayList, prints out the player menu, then respond to the player's inputs. Input 1 for computer help, input 2 for all new letters, input 3 to quit the game. At the same time, we keep a score.
        Parameters:
        args - - args is an array of console line argument whose data type is a String
